summary: NETRA ERP - Expense Approval UI Features Testing Complete. All new features verified working: Receipts button/dialog (view/upload/download/delete), Send Back button/dialog, Modify Amount button/dialog (partial approval with percentage indicator), status badges (Pending, manager_approved, receipt count). 100% UI Pass Rate.
